feed.title: Weinberg Lab
feed.subtitle: We are a group in the Pathology Department at Northwestern University focused on immunometabolism, inflammation, and mitochondrial biology.

entry.title: Lab Receives CHI Pilot Award for Inborn Errors of Metabolism Research

link.title: Lab Receives CHI Pilot Award for Inborn Errors of Metabolism Research

entry.content:
Sam has been awarded the inaugural Center for Human Immunobiology (CHI) Collaborative Pilot Award! His co-awardee is Dr. Divakar S. Mithal, MD, PhD, Assistant Professor of Pediatrics (Neurology and Epilepsy).

The award provides $100,000 for their project: “Immunometabolic Phenotyping for Children with Inborn Errors of Metabolism.”

More info about the CHI can be found here.
entry.summary: Sam has been awarded the inaugural Center for Human Immunobiology (CHI) Collaborative Pilot Award! His co-awardee is Dr. Divakar S. Mithal, MD, PhD, Assistant Professor of Pediatrics (Neurology and Epilepsy).
